summary: Enforces rules that block any transition of a flow run into the PENDING state when the run is already pending, running, cancelling, or cancelled, thereby preventing duplicate submissions and race conditions. It also guides proper state changes for re‑runs of deployed and ad‑hoc runs.
business_intent: Maintain execution consistency by disallowing inappropriate PENDING transitions, ensuring that only one worker can submit a run and that re‑runs follow the correct scheduling logic.
